        Returns:
        the decrypted String Usage example: String pksPw = FLAREclientUtil.decrypt("9cBB801VfbB95YRdi0fNg");

        Encrypt a plain text password in AES
        Parameters:
        plainText - the String text to be encrypted in AES
        Returns:
        the encrypted text String Usage example: String encryptedPassword = FLAREclientUtil.encrypt("clearTextPassword");

      • getKeyEntry

        public static java.security.KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry getKeyEntry(java.lang.String keyStorePath,
                                                 java.lang.String keyStorePW,
                                                 java.lang.String keyName,
                                                 java.lang.String keyPW)
        Fetch private key from KeyStore
        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - a String containing the path to the KeyStore
        keyStorePW - a String containing the KeyStore password
        keyName - a String containing the alias of targeted certificate
        keyPW - a String containing the key password
        Returns:
        The PrivateKeyEntry object containing the targeted private key Usage example: String keyStorePath = "/path/to/myKeyStore.jks"; String keyStorePW = "passwordForMyKeyStore"; String keyName = "FLAREclient"; String keyPW = "passwordForMyKey"; PrivateKeyEntry myKey = FLAREclientUtil.getKeyEntry(keyStorePath, keyStorePW, keyName, keyPW);

        Returns:

      • getPublicKey

        public static java.security.PublicKey getPublicKey(java.security.KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry keyEntry)
        Fetch public key (certificate) from PrivateKeyEntry object
        Parameters:
        keyEntry - a PrivateKeyEntry object containing key of interest
        Returns:
        The PublicKey object containing the targeted public key Usage example: PublicKey myKey = FLAREclientUtil.getPublicKey(privateKeyEntry);

      • getPublicKeyByAlias

        public static java.security.PublicKey getPublicKeyByAlias(java.lang.String keyStorePath,
                                          java.lang.String keyStorePW,
                                          java.lang.String alias)
        Fetch public key (certificate) from KeyStore
        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - a String containing the path to the KeyStore
        keyStorePW - a String containing the KeyStore password
        alias - a String containing the alias of targeted certificate
        Returns:
        The PublicKey object containing the targeted public key Usage example: String keyStorePath = "/path/to/myKeyStore.jks"; String keyStorePW = "passwordForMyKeyStore"; String alias = "FLAREhub"; PublicKey hubCertificate = FLAREclientUtil.getPublicKeyByAlias(keyStorePath, keyStorePW, alias);

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the node object with the ds:Signature tag removed or null if ds:Signature block isn't found Usage example: Node newNode = FLAREclientUtil.removeDSSignatureTag(oldNode);

        Sends an HTTPS POST request and returns the response

        conn - the HTTPS connection object
        payload - the payload for the POST request
        Returns:

      • validateStix

        public static boolean validateStix(org.w3c.dom.Document taxiiDoc)
        Validate each Content block in a TAXII document (against the STIX schema files)
        Parameters:
        taxiiDoc - The TAXII document containing the STIX to be validated
        Returns:
        true if all STIX validates, false otherwise Usage example: boolean result = FLAREclientUtil.validateStix(taxiiDoc);
